detail_desc: Short skirt in sequin-embroidered velour with concealed elastication at the waist. Jersey lining.

LIMITED EDITION. Blouse in silk with a sheen, with concealed buttons down the front and lace sections on the shoulders. Long dolman sleeves, wide, gently rounded cuffs with a covered button, and a gently rounded hem.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a lace trim around the neckline and opening with twisted ties at the top. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
Dress in an airy viscose crêpe weave with lace details. V-neck with twisted ties at the top, cap sleeves, and a seam at the waist and on the skirt. Unlined.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in stretch jersey with a glossy finish. High waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and slim legs.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Narrow metal bracelet. Width 0.5 cm.
Fitted top in crinkled jersey made from a viscose blend with a V-neck and long sleeves. Wrapover front and an adjustable tie with a round buckle at one side.
Knee-length, printed swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Fitted vest top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey.
Lace bra with underwired, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with decorative, overlocked seams, a seam at the waist and concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Brogues with a decorative welt seam around the soles, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Twill linings and insoles and fluted ethylene vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Fitted, long-sleeved tops in stretch organic cotton jersey with a wide neckline.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid, elasticated waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
Elasticated scrunchies in soft fabric.
Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with long sleeves and gathered, buttoned cuffs. Double layer at the top of the front, a gathered seam under the bust, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Cropped, fitted top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined, wrapover hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist. Legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and press-studs at the hems.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a round neckline and narrow shoulder straps.
Calf-length, fitted skirt in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a high, elasticated waist.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a zip down the front and along one leg, long sleeves and full feet.

Short-sleeved shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with an accentuated waist and narrow shoulders to create a fitted silhouette.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in soft jersey.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Body in microfibre and lace with a firm shaping effect on the tummy and seat. Adjustable shoulder straps and a lined gusset with press-studs.

Top in a textured weave made from a viscose blend with a square neckline, short puff sleeves with narrow cuffs and adjustable buttoning, and a seam at the hem with a gently flared peplum. Partly lined.

Shirt in a woven cotton blend with a grandad collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Ankle-length joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with block-coloured sections. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet pockets in the side seams and covered elastication at the hems.
Knee-length, off-the-shoulder dress in woven fabric with elastication and decorative embroidery at the top, short sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Sleeveless nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover at the top and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Shirt in a striped viscose weave with a grandad collar, French front and pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a zip down the front and along one leg, long sleeves and full feet.
Slightly shorter top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck and narrow, tie-top shoulder straps.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with wide ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an interactive motif on the front.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, zipped front pockets, ribbed cuffs and reflective details. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with triangular, lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and en elasticated hem. The polyamide in the bra is partly recycled.
Leggings in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elastication at the waist and hems.
Brazilian briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a low, elasticated waist, lined gusset, cut-out sections at the top of the back and a high cut at the back.
Straight-cut jacket in soft jersey with long notch lapels, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No buttons. Unlined.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that split into two at the front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Trousers in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, and wide, straight-cut legs.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in soft slub cotton jersey with broderie anglaise at the front, frills that continue over the shoulders and press-studs at the back. Elasticated seam at the waist and tapered legs with smocking at the hems.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit with a roll-edge neckline, long sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in sturdy jersey with long sleeves and elastication and two flounces in woven fabric at the top. Gathers in the sides for best fit. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.

Slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), and a zip fly and button. Coin pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Trousers in lightweight cotton twill with a detachable key chain. High, frill-trimmed waist with covered elastication, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated, cuffed hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved tops with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
5-pocket trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs with decorative zips at the top and decorative seams.
Short, fitted jersey top with short sleeves, a visible seam down the front and an asymmetric hem. Slightly shorter front with a draped detail at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with visible buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft knit with sequins, a faux fur pompom on top and a wide, turned-up hem.
Trousers woven in a viscose blend with a high paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and tapered legs.
Top in soft, lightly crêped jersey with a V-neck opening at the top and a vertical seam down the front.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Regular waist with a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a visible seam centre back, long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Double-layered headband knitted in a soft alpaca and wool blend with a wrapover detail at the front.

T-shirt in hard-washed slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline and seam centre back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, decorative lacing at the front, a zip on one side and a loop at the back. Soft fleece linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Small, glittery shoulder bag in braided plastic straw and imitation leather with a metal chain shoulder strap. One inner compartment and a flap with a snap lock. Lined.
V-neck jumper knitted in a wool blend with low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lace, off-the-shoulder dress with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Elasticated flounce at the top, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined.

Parka in patterned cotton twill with corduroy details, a lined hood and zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. One chest pocket with a flap and press-stud and one with a zipped chest pocket, a flap sleeve pocket with a press-stud, flap front pockets with a press-stud and concealed side pockets. Drawstring at the waist, adjustable tabs with press-studs at the cuffs, zips at the sides of the hem and a drawstring hem. Lined.
Double-layer hat in patterned jersey.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wide, draped polo neck, dropped shoulders, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides.

Set with a bodysuit, pair of shorts and hat in soft, printed organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders, short sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Shorts with an elasticated waist. Hat with a sewn-in turn-up.

Short, wide dress in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline and long, slightly wider sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Gathered seam at the hips for added volume at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
